item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - Godzilla.x.Kong.The.New.Empire.2024.1080p.MAX.WEB-DL.DDP5.1.Atmos.x264-Samuel
item.description:
Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2 | Poster 1 | Poster 2 | Poster 3 | Poster 4 | Background Art 1 | Background Art 2 | Key Art

PG‑13 • 1h 55m • 2024 •
Adventure • Fantasy & Sci-Fi

Description
The ultimate Titan team-up! Godzilla and Kong face a colossal threat from Hollow World, challenging their very existence — and our own.
Click to expand...

Click to expand...

PG‑13

Starring
Rebecca Hall, Bryan Tyree Henry, Kaylee Hottle, Dan Stevens

Director
Adam Wingard

Writers
Terry Rossio, Simon Barrett, Jeremy Slater

Producers
Jay Ashenfelter, Yoshimitsu Banno, Jennifer Conroy, Alex Garcia, Eric McLeod, Mary Parent
